description: Dramatic thigh-high boots with steel-tipped heels

core:description.text: Commanding thigh-high boots crafted from sleek black leather, fitted closely to the leg from toe to thigh. Steel-tipped heels provide both durability and a distinctive sharp click with each step, announcing your presence before you arrive. The boots feature a side zipper for easy wear while maintaining their streamlined silhouette. These statement pieces combine elegance with edge, adding commanding height while creating a bold gothic aesthetic that pairs beautifully with leather trousers or dramatic gowns.
